messages: Breathe in, breathe out. Let it go!
Anger is one letter short of danger.
Keep calm and carry on.
The world is not perfect, but it’s still beautiful.
Turn your disgust into determination!
A clean heart sees a beautiful world.
Fear is just excitement without breath.
Courage is not the absence of fear, but triumph over it.
Do one thing every day that scares you!
activities: Write down what you fear and challenge it ✍️

messages: Keep smiling, life is beautiful!
Happiness is contagious, spread it!
The best way to multiply your happiness is to share it.
activities: Call a friend and share your happiness ☎️

messages: Every moment is a fresh beginning.
A balanced mind is a happy mind.
Life is a journey, enjoy the ride!
Tough times don’t last, but tough people do.
Sadness flies away on the wings of time.
Behind every dark cloud, there's a silver lining.
Expect the unexpected!
Life is full of surprises!
Surprise yourself every day!
activities: Share a fun fact with someone 🗣️
